Kozak gra, polecam serdecznie. Ostatnio troche duzo haxow ale da sie grac. Prosto sie wbija rangi, lecz slaba opcja jest spadanie z rangi w przypadku gdy teammate dostanie vaca. Takim sposobem spadlem z DMG do GN1 co bylo troche irytujace. Bardzo latwo nauczyc sie w to grac.

It's fun, but play with friends when you're just starting to not feel overwhelmed. Best would be getting someone experienced to get you started off. Otherwise, you'll lose interest in it quite fast.

The games, though it's basically the same runs 95% of the time, is quite fun even after hours of playing.

Very strategic and  fun to play. The mechanics and physics of the game are refined and well-thought out. There is a high element of teamwork and personally puts the game above competitors of similar genre.
